title: Salty boosted teammates,flame you and get you banned.
body: Thanks riot,you have made me very seriously consider retiring from league of legends altogether,why should i have to tolerate joining games with players who do not communicate with the team,when they do communicate all they do is flame,i had a game last night where my teammates would watch me initiate a fight,than dance..sit there dancing..when i thought it was a 2v2 they would twist it around and flame me to make me look bad than say why would i 1v2...obviously im going to get enraged when these 2 and the other team are flaming me..i went in the game with a positive outlook..these guys wouldnt speak a word..then when things got heated all they did was flame and flame..my friend got banned aswell the other day because he was being flamed and responded to the flaming..you know how hard it is to keep a cool head in this game when you have people straight up using you as there fun tool? is that not against the code of conduct(having fun at others expense) (targeting us like bullies so that we react and they dont get any punishment because they projected it upon us)..my language was rotten but there gameplay and attitude was disgusting..I go mostly into my games with a good attitude..my 2 teammates i got last night took 40-50 seconds to even start,let alone they would not communicate with me until i asked the other team to report them for botting..then they started flaming hard..thanks riot for the ban..I have been trying my utmost not to get pissed off but these guys seriously put me down..why should i and others be banned for the appalling behavior..oh yeah..i was bronze 2..they are gold and silver...i was doing a 3v3..and i was carrying..these guys were flaming hard..wouldnt help me..and fed. thanks riot..ban the player who wants to play and win...and communicate..until amumu came out.

replies.body:
Yup I've received a chat ban twice now for exactly what you done in that situation, retaliated. I don't recall being abusive or singling a person out but I was banned for my apparent negative attitude towards the same kind of people you played with.

Riot are apparently working on things, but it's been this way for as long as I can remember and nothing has changed. The longer they keep their heads in the sand and believe their automated system is working the worse off it will get.

It sucks but unfortunately that's the best advice I can give. If you don't like reading it or have a thick enough skin to brush it off the only other option is to mute people and report after the game. If it's any consolation I'm sure if those people who were toxic have a nice chat restriction or possible perma ban coming their way shortly.

I doubt you're going to get any reaction from Riot, maybe the standard copy pasta response.

I know exactly what you're saying and the game is riddled with it. There's little to nothing you can do but use the shitty automated system at the end of the game and hope to god that they get banned. Realistically tho unless it's a common thing and they continually do it I very much doubt they will be perma banned.

Best thing you can do in these situations is mute everyone and play your own game. Accept that you are going to lose and try keep your cool. Because if you flame in return chances are you will be getting a few reports from the other flamers and they will only be getting one from you.

It's just part of the shit mentality and attitude that makes up the OCE server. Everyone wants to jump on the bandwagon and play the blame game when things don't work out.

i really appreciate your response..if riot had been watching my past games/chat logs ive been making a positive impact.1/10 games become trash and we get punished for it....thing is bro..i dont want to mute everyone/anyone for that matter..if it comes to a toxic team and people i would distance myself..however with the case last night i was being told to kill myself and more degenerate crap was aimed at me,i was cut up and reacted.. i personally have had an occasion when i was in the game lobby one time..i was trying to talk to my team..not one person responded..then i get into the game..apparently i was "spamming" and one of the players decided to project his afk and bad playing upon me..they threw the game because i was trying to talk to them nicely/work with my team..i assume people join groups in discord and flame the other players they get matched with..not all but allot of people do it..so..even when im trying to make a positive impact..it gets taken the wrong way..and i get punished for it..last night i was pretty rude.but i wasnt the worst one there..i understand a punishment for my language,im not saying i dont deserve a ban what im pissed off with was how they decided to....I know players like me and you care about this game,but im certain that if riot doesnt fix this..allot of innocent people are going to be leaving the game/via banned or simply walking away from the toxic crowd.
